education.institution: The University of Texas at Austin

highlights: Led development of a marketing tool for communications campaigns, managing 2M customers per campaign within a 4-hour window.
Optimized AWS infrastructure, implementing cost-saving measures that reduced AWS costs by 48 thousand dollars a year.
Managed and enhanced a communication system sending 600k messages daily via SMS, push, email, and voice.
Initiated and led semi-weekly meetings to assign and review pull requests across 18 repositories.
Spearheaded analytics integration into four production services, collaborating with two teams and contributing to their repositories.
Consistently developed test suites and launch plans to ensure successful rollout and reliable event tracking for new features.
Developed the frontend and backend systems for in-app grocery order check-ins, processing around 50k check-ins per day.
Led iOS push notification system delivering 100k daily notifications, enhancing HEB Curbside and Delivery.
Created and deployed the first iOS widget for MyHEB.
Developed an app review prompt system integrated with an external reporting system.
Rearchitected profile and communication preference experience.
Collaborated on MyHEB iOS platform with 400k daily and 1M total users, sharing responsibilities for app deployment, monitoring, and enhancements.
Added Redux to areas of the core React app, improving state management across multiple web products.
Integrated linters, testing frameworks, and deployment pipelines, significantly improving workflow efficiency and data tracking.

awards.title: Mentor
awards.summary: Mentored two high school students by holding bi-weekly meetings focused on technology skill development, positive habit building, college expectations, and career development, while providing organized resources on these topics.
